ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.

ul.li: 3+ years experience in a professional programming position
Passionate about Continuous Build, Integration, Test, Deployment, Delivery and the DevOps culture
Experience in Java, scripting languages, Linux and relational databases.
Experience with Git, Docker, Kafka, Solr, Cassandra, and Hadoop are desirable
Experience with the internals of Docker
In depth knowledge of build systems.
Have a belief in automation and tooling as a critical part of the software lifecycle
Aptitude to independently learn new technologies

div.p:
As a key contributor to this team, you will build and maintain Automation Frameworks in addition to developing tools to aid Continuous Integration/Delivery. You will work efficiently with cross-functional teams, understand product requirements, design test strategy and plans and implement end-to-end tests. You are expected to build the product expertise needed to help debug production issues and integrate with monitoring infrastructures.
Join our exciting team that has been leading the digital goods industry by constantly developing innovative features since its launch in April 2003. We are looking for a self starting, energetic individual who is not afraid to question assumptions and who has excellent written and oral skills. We look for good team players, who are able to tackle tough problems under tight deadlines and deliver imaginative solutions.
